statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, department FROM patient_records WHERE department = 'Cardiology'
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_records WHERE last_updated > '2021-09-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM patient_records
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_records WHERE last_updated > NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_records WHERE department = 'Orthopedics' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_records WHERE department = 'Neurology';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE department = 'Oncology' AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, department FROM patients;
SELECT diagnosis, name FROM patients WHERE department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM treatments;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_description FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM treatments WHERE treatment_type = 'Surgery';
SELECT name, treatment_description FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatments.treatment_type = 'Medication';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, plan_date FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentPlans ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentPlans.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, department_name FROM Patients JOIN Departments ON Patients.department_id = Departments.department_id;
SELECT plan_id, patient_name, treatment_details, plan_date FROM TreatmentPlans JOIN Patients ON TreatmentPlans.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM Patients JOIN Departments ON Patients.department_id = Departments.department_id GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT department, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM Patients GROUP BY department;
SELECT treatment_date, treatment_details FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, message, datetime FROM Communication WHERE datetime >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_name, department, treatment_plan FROM Patients WHERE department = 'Neurology' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT department_name, head_doctor FROM Departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Surgery%';

SELECT patient_name, treatment_date, treatment_details FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Departments;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM Departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, department_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Departments ON Patients.department_id = Departments.department_id;
SELECT user_name, department_name FROM Users JOIN Departments ON Users.department_id = Departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM Departments;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM Departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Departments.department_name FROM Patients JOIN Departments ON Patients.department_id = Departments.department_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, PatientRecords.record_text, PatientRecords.timestamp FROM Patients JOIN PatientRecords ON Patients.patient_id = PatientRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.department_id = 2 ORDER BY PatientRecords.timestamp DESC;

SELECT Users.user_name, Departments.department_name, PatientRecords.record_text FROM Users JOIN Departments ON Users.department_id = Departments.department_id JOIN Patients ON Users.department_id = Patients.department_id JOIN PatientRecords ON Patients.patient_id = PatientRecords.patient_id;
